product_name: The North Face Baltoro 400 III Winter Boots - Men's
long_description: The North Face Baltoro 400 III boots let you choose your own winter stomping grounds, with a sturdy waterproof construction and -40degF rating that will keep your feet warm just about anywhere. Mid-calf uppers made from waterproof nubuck leather and reinforced with seam sealing; D-rings attach to your gaiters for a more complete seal against snow and debris. PrimaLoft(R) Eco 400g insulation-derived from recycled materials-paves a path to warmth and comfort. Dri-Lex(R) fleece linings are soft and moisture-wicking for a cozy fit all day long. Compression-molded EVA midsoles provide lightweight, flexible and impact-resistant cushioning. Removable dual-density footbeds deliver extra padding under heel and forefoot. Injection-molded nylon shanks reduce cold temperature conductivity and deliver torsional stability so you can walk confidently on any surface. TNF Winter Grip(TM) rubber outsoles grip snow and wet surfaces for solid traction. Ice Pick(TM) rubber lugs on outsoles harden when temps fall below freezing, providing the North Face Baltoro 400 III boots with extra bite into icy terrain.
short_description: The North Face Baltoro 400 III boots let you choose your own winter stomping grounds, with a sturdy waterproof construction and -40degF rating that will keep your feet warm just about anywhere.
